resources.string: You are sitting in the coffee shop, and you really need to get to business and study for your basket weaving class. Chad is the barista.
You go up to get a Chai latte with 2 pumps of raspberry, oat milk, 67% ice. Chad gives you a look and hands you the drink, spelling your name wrong (he spells “basic”).
You ask him on a date to slam poetry. He instantly says yes!
Surprisingly, he’s into getting hot drinks thrown at him, coffee being his number one. He asks you on a date.
